page.title: 03Pete Tye Farm
page.content: We went to visit {Pete Tye Farm. When we got there we met Mr Coan the farmer. First we went to see the sows. On the way to the sty we met Pat, he is in charge of the pigs stys. Mr Coan has two horses one called Bell and the other one is called Holly. We gave the horses grass. Mr Coan had a bird scarer that was run on gas, it went Bang!. The farm does not sell their manure, they put it in their crops. We saw some sows, some piglets and some boars, there were about 50 boars, over a 100 sows and over 1000 piglets. Mr Coan had a field of oil seed rape, wheat and peas. The pigeons were racing Blues.
